results.text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
results.reason: Encourages reliance on God rather than self.
results.reflection: Trusting in God leads to clarity and guidance.

results.text: The heart is deceitful above all things and beyond cure. Who can understand it?
results.reason: Highlights the deceptive nature of our own hearts.
results.reflection: Recognizing our own limitations can lead us to trust in God's wisdom.

results.text: Whoever trusts in his own mind is a fool, but he who walks in wisdom will be delivered.
results.reason: Contrasts trusting in oneself with walking in wisdom.
results.reflection: True deliverance comes from walking in God's wisdom, not relying solely on ourselves.

results.text: The heart of man plans his way, but the Lord establishes his steps.
results.reason: Emphasizes God's sovereignty over our plans.
results.reflection: While we may make plans, ultimately, God determines our path.

results.text: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
results.reason: Urges reliance on God rather than human abilities.
results.reflection: Finding refuge in God is superior to placing trust solely in ourselves or others.
